Scale - Class in com.myronmarston.music.scales
Scales are used to convert a Note to a MidiNote and to provide the midi file with a time signature.

setScaleStep(int) - Method in class com.myronmarston.music.Note
Sets the number of scale steps above the tonic; In an 7-note scale, 0 = tonic, 7 = octave, 9 = third an octave above, etc.
